title: Must be level 7 or higher to post a comment
body: Can not post comments due to reason in title. I am lvl 30 for a few years actually.

replies.body:
Should be working!

FYI, there's a tool right up at the top that does this sync without needing to post.
Where? Not sure what I'm looking for. I did get it to work though.

The big post stickied at the top saying 	

>Boards Profile Syncing Tool

Sounds like it's someone's first time. We'll be gentle.

Posting here pushed through a manual update that synced your Boards account with your Summoner Level. Looks like you're level 30 like you should be now!
